mapper.select: SELECT b.FCONTACTUNIT AS customerId, sum(a.FAMOUNT) AS beginShouldGet FROM T_AR_OTHERRECABLEENTRY a JOIN T_AR_OTHERRECABLE b ON a.FID = b.FID JOIN T_BD_CUSTOMER e on e.FCUSTID = b.FCONTACTUNIT WHERE b.FDATE >=#{dateStart} and b.FDATE <=#{dateEnd} and e.FPRIMARYGROUP = #{primaryGroup} group by b.FCONTACTUNIT
